meanings.definition: A device or software program that arranges data or events in a specific order.
meanings.sent1: The sequencer helped organize the music tracks in the right order.
meanings.sent2: I used the sequencer to put the numbers in a sequence.
meanings.sent3: The sequencer decided to mix up the order just for fun.
meanings.sent4: Her mind worked like a sequencer, arranging thoughts in perfect order.
meanings.sent5: The sequencer hummed as it sorted the files effortlessly.

meanings.definition: A person or thing that sequences or puts things in order.
meanings.sent1: The librarian was like a sequencer, arranging books on the shelves.
meanings.sent2: The sequencer in the factory ensured the production line ran smoothly.
meanings.sent3: The sequencer tediously lined up the ducks in a row.
meanings.sent4: His fingers moved like a sequencer, placing the cards in perfect order.
meanings.sent5: The sequencer of the group, she always made sure everyone was in line.
